json.text: Now I inform you of one matter:
Li Mo is an important co-worker and also specially trained by our church.
To my surprise, even with such high quality and intelligence,
she accepted the “Eastern Lightning.”
Huh?
Really? What happened?
How could it be?
It can’t be true!
Li Mo has believed in the Lord for years, and she is a preacher.
How could she be deceived by the “Eastern Lightning”?
Yeah. That’s really incredible!
She has high quality and intelligence;
how could she betray the Lord so easily?
Can the elder’s words be false?
It seems that this “Eastern Lightning” is indeed not simple,
even Li Mo could be deceived.
We must be careful! (Yes.)
Right. Li Mo has accepted the “Eastern Lightning.”
Now she’s a danger.
We can’t receive her from now on.
Li Mo could accept the “Eastern Lightning”; it’s not simple.
It seems that the “Eastern Lightning” is not an ordinary sect.
We should be on our guard!
I’ve believed in the Lord for a short time,
but it’s impossible for me to be deceived in a few days.
She is converted so quickly!
Right. Even Li Mo who is full of quality is deceived.
This “Eastern Lightning” is not simple! (Yes.)
Yes, it’s not simple!
Yes, it’s really not simple! (Yes.)
Okay, be quiet.
Li Mo not only betrays the Lord but also begins to deceive others now.
As for such apostasy, what shall we do?
After all, Li Mo has worked for the Lord for years.
We’d better try our best to save her!
She’s worked for years but could still betray the Lord.
Such a person should be expelled!
I agree. She should be expelled.
Huh? No, please give her a chance!
Chance, what chance?
Let’s save her first!
If she is really incorrigible, it won’t be too late to expel her.
As a preacher who believed for years,
she can still betray the Lord and even dares to deceive others.
It’s lenient to expel her!
I’ll inform the co-workers of the churches Li Mo is in charge of,
and ask them to watch her.
We can never allow her to come back to the churches to deceive others.
Now quickly print and give out these materials to the brothers and sisters.
Tell them to watch out and not to listen to any strangers’ preaching.
And ask them to curse those who preach Almighty God’s gospel in their prayer.
Li Mo has no conscience.
Hey, sisters!
Bah!
Betrayer!
Yeah, I’m coming.
Hey, Sister Li. (Mm.)
Come in.
Sister Gu is also here.
There you are. Please sit down.
Sister Li, is anything wrong?
Why don’t you attend the Bible study?
Sister Li. You’re just in time.
We want to ask you something.
Did you hear of that?
Elder Wang has embezzled the church offerings,
at least over two hundred thousand yuan.
As an elder, he could do that. He is simply more hateful than Judas.
He will be cursed.
He still asked us to attend the Bible study.
We don’t want to attend it with such a person.
We can’t accept such a false shepherd to shepherd the church.
He is an evil servant.
Sister Li, what do you think of this matter?
Is it true?
Many people are discussing it.
If it’s really like that, it’s serious.
He is a Judas and he is sinning.
It’s serious to embezzle so much money.
Anyhow, the One we believe in is the Lord, not a certain man.
We should continue to attend the Bible study.
And don’t worry. We’ll investigate this matter.
If it’s true, we’ll expose and reject him.
We believe that the Lord is righteous.
Recently there are fewer and fewer believers in the church.
Some are busy working and earning money,
and some would rather play mahjong or chat than attend meetings.
The main reason is that many people are deceived by the “Eastern Lightning.”
Do you know where there are the most people who are deceived?
The churches in Handan City, I think.
The co-workers and preachers there
have led many believers to believe in the “Eastern Lightning.”
Yes!
The churches there are the most severely deceived by the “Eastern Lightning.”
So we have to take some measures.
Otherwise, the believers will be all deceived.
Then what should we do?
If the fruits we bore after years of hard work
are taken away by the “Eastern Lightning,”
won’t we suffer a great loss?
When I tried to retrieve them,
they all said that the people of the “Eastern Lightning” preached well.
Right, their preaching is indeed high.
I also heard of that.
They specially go to every church to snatch people.
Our believers are mainly drawn to their church.
You should keep a good lookout recently.
Tell the brothers and sisters not to receive any strangers.
Li Mo, Handan is your hometown. Go home as soon as possible.
Investigate the situation there
and draw back those deceived brothers and sisters.
Mm. Okay, I’ll go back as soon as I can.
In our last co-worker meeting,
I found that Sister Liu and Brother Ma didn’t like Elder Wang’s preaching.
And in this meeting,
I found that Brother Ma seemed to intentionally speak words against Elder Wang.
Maybe you haven’t known yet.
They’re deeply biased against Elder Wang.
They disclosed to the brothers and sisters
that Elder Wang embezzled the church offerings,
and he also said many bad words about them.
Now there’s discord in the church.
Some stand on Elder Wang’s side,
and some are willing to follow Brother Ma and Sister Liu.
Due to this matter, many people become cold in faith and want to withdraw.
I also heard about it. Aren’t they dividing the church?
Aye! We have no right to interfere in the things of the upper co-workers.
May the Lord heal these rifts.
After you go back, you must try to bring Sister Qi over.
The brothers and sisters trust her so much,
but she was taken away by the “Eastern Lightning.”
After you go back, try to talk more about the Bible with her patiently. (Mm.)
Tell her not to be obstinate.
As long as she’s willing to change her mind,
the three of us can sustain the church with one accord.
Yeah, I agree. (Mm.)
The merciful heavenly Father, the Lord Jesus who loves us.
You’re our Savior. I thank and praise You.
O Lord, Your word is our spiritual food and manna.
You are a lamp to our feet and a light to our path.
To repay the Lord Jesus’ holy love on the cross,
I’m willing to offer up myself
to safeguard the Lord’s way and protect the flock.
O Lord, now many false Christs, false prophets, and heresies all come out,
and they’ve deceived many lambs.
May the Lord bind and curse all devils and Satans and care for Your lambs.
O Lord, may You lead me by Your hand
to bring back those deceived lambs in the churches.
May the Lord be with me.
May such thankful prayer be in the holy name of my Lord Jesus Christ. Amen!
Amen!
After having left my hometown for four years, I finally took the train back.
Daughter, it’s your favorite.
Eat more. (Mm.)
Dad, mom, eat some.
Yeah! Well, okay, you eat it.
Have more.
You haven’t been home for four years.
We always talk about you and hope that you can come back.
To our surprise, you’re really back.
Mom, I’ve been wanting to come back to see you.
However, there is too much work in the church, and so I can’t get away.
Momo, do you know? We heard great news. (Yes!)
The Lord Jesus we’ve been expecting has come back!
So, we want to tell you earlier.
The Lord Jesus has come back?
Dad, mom, are you deceived by the “Eastern Lightning”?
Momo, calm down. Listen to me.
At the beginning, we didn’t believe either.
Later, the brothers and sisters read to us many words of Almighty God,
and then we understood that this is indeed the true way.
Momo, later, read God’s word and you’ll know.
Don’t condemn blindly, okay?
Dad, mom. Why are you so muddle-headed?
This is apostasy and betraying the Lord Jesus.
Momo, we believers in the Lord should watch our tongue.
Don’t condemn blindly!
You haven’t heard it yet!
Don’t be influenced by those rumors outside.
Right! We have been expecting the Lord Jesus to return to take us.
However, when the Lord really comes back, why do you show such an attitude?
Mom, stop it. I don’t wanna listen!
The Lord Jesus has given us so much grace, so we can’t betray Him.
I’ll hold fast to the Lord’s way. I won’t be deceived by you!
Momo, listen to me. (No!)
Momo. (I don’t wanna listen.)
Listen to me!
Momo.
I don’t wanna listen.
Xiaomo, Xiaomo, Xiaomo, open the door. Let us tell you in detail.
I don’t wanna listen! Leave me alone!
Momo, open the door.
(sigh)
Lord Jesus, Abba Father. In the time of danger, I pray to You.
I’ll forever lift up the cross and follow the Lord to walk the way of the cross.
O Lord. Please listen to my prayer and give me wisdom.
Dear Lord. I’ve never expected that
my parents would apostatize, and be deceived by the “Eastern Lightning.”
O Lord! May You seal my heart, shut my ears, and keep me from leaving You.
I’m willing to be Your faithful servant. I swear not to betray You.
O Lord, I’m willing to bind all devils and Satans
in the name of my Lord Jesus Christ.
O Lord, please drive away the believers in the “Eastern Lightning”
and save back the deceived brothers and sisters and my parents.
May the Lord forgive my parents’ sin.
I’m willing to bind all devils and Satans in the name of my Lord Jesus Christ.
May the Lord send angels and armies of heaven to pitch a camp around my house.
May the above prayer be in the name of my Lord Jesus Christ. Amen!
Uncle, auntie.
Xiaoqi is here.
Come, come in for a rest. Well, have a seat.
I heard that Xiaomo is back. (Yes.)
I came to see her.
Yeah, she’s just come back.
Pour some water for Xiaoqi.
Xiaomo, your Sister Qi is here to see you.
Sister Qi.
Come, drink some water.
Okay, thanks!
Sister Qi.
Oh! I was just going to see you!
I haven’t seen you for years, and I missed you so much. Well, have a seat, both of you. (Yes, have a seat.)
How are you now?
Fine. I miss you too.
You see, after hearing that you’ve been back, I came quickly.
Sister Qi. You led many brothers and sisters to believe in Almighty God, right?
Ah, I came just to talk with you about it.
Sister Qi, you’re the main preacher of our church.
How can you lead the brothers and sisters to betray the Lord?
What did you promise to the Lord at that time?
Come.
Xiaomo, take it easy. Please listen to me.
Sister Qi, you all say that the Lord has come back.
Where is He? Who has seen Him?
Momo, I ask you a question first.
Do we believe the Lord Jesus is the true God because of seeing Him?
Now among so many believers in Jesus,
no one believes in Him because of seeing His flesh, right?
The Bible says,
Because we’ve received peace, grace, and blessing in believing in the Lord,
we are certain that Jesus is the true God.
Besides, the Bible records that the Lord’s word is the truth,
so we believe that Jesus is the Lord, right?
Right! Since you all believe that the Lord Jesus has come back,
do you have any evidence?
Of course we have. Auntie.
We believe the Lord has come back
according to the word God expresses in the end time.
From God’s word and utterance,
we recognize that Almighty God is Jesus who has returned in the flesh.
Yes, we’re not believing groundlessly.
The Lord Jesus prophesied that He would return in the end time.
Actually, the Lord’s returning in the end time is to save man.
He will surely bring the work He wants to do,
express the words He wants to say, and reveal His disposition. (Mm.)
From God’s work, words, and disposition,
we can see that He has God’s substance and God’s being.
So, we can recognize that He is the returned Lord Jesus.
Momo, you haven’t read the words God expresses in the end time,
so don’t condemn it blindly.
Well, let us read to you a passage of words God expresses in the end time
and you discern it yourself.
We can’t force you to accept (Right.)
but only hope you can make an investigation before drawing a conclusion.
I don’t wanna listen.
Words are but wind; seeing is believing.
I haven’t seen the Lord comes,
so I won’t believe no matter how well you fellowship.
Momo, if we circumscribe the Lord’s returning with our notions,
you won’t know Him even if you see Him with your own eyes.
Think it over.
Isn’t it the believers in God who crucified the Lord Jesus?
Yes, so what?
In retrospect:
At that time many Jews and Pharisees waited for Messiah every day;
however, when Messiah really came, they didn’t know nor believe in Him.
They couldn’t recognize that Messiah is Jesus
and they even condemned and blasphemed Him.
Didn’t they still crucify Jesus?
Nevertheless, those Gentiles had never seen Jesus’ flesh,
but they believed in and followed Jesus
through listening to Jesus’ way from others.
Right, Momo. Without a heart of seeking,
even if one sees God with his own eyes, he won’t know Him. (Yes.)
And he will condemn God.
Momo, let’s read a passage of God’s words together.
We all know that the Bible prophesied:
In the end time, God will open the scroll and break the seven seals.
The Holy Spirit will speak to the churches and supply man all the truths.
God will reward the good and punish the evil; God will decide man’s outcome.
In the end time, God will express the mysteries and truths we have never heard,
do the work of judging man,
and bring those who are purified by His word into the pleasant destination.
Almighty God expresses millions of words
and discloses all the mysteries in the Bible.
He tells us God’s six-thousand-year management plan,
the inside truth of God’s three stages of works, and the mystery of incarnation.
Besides, He exposes and dissects the root of corrupt mankind’s sinning
and shows us the way of having our disposition transformed,
so that those who truly follow Him can thoroughly break free
from the fallen life of committing sins in the day and confessing them at night.
With such work and such words, nobody can achieve.
From that we can completely confirm that
this is the true way and the appearing of the true God.
Sister Qi, since you all say that the Lord has come back,
let me ask you: In the past, we were great in faith and very strong in spirit.
Even though we were very busy and had many things to handle,
we didn’t forget the Lord.
Moreover, every time we had a meeting, we could receive some light.
Now the co-workers raise envy and strife among themselves,
there are divisions in the churches,
and many believers become passive and weak and grow cold in faith.
Doesn’t the Lord know these?
Why are the churches still so desolate after the Lord comes?
What you asked is the question that had been puzzling me for years.
Now through reading Almighty God’s words,
I understand the real reason why the churches are desolate.
Xiaomo, you can read this passage of God’s words,
Xiaomo, from God’s words, we can see:
Now the whole religious world is disordered and desolate,
because the Holy Spirit has already stopped working
in the churches of the Age of the Grace
and started to do the work of the Age of the Kingdom.
Only the God of today is the spring of living water.
Only those who follow the working of the Holy Spirit can have strength.
Right, Momo. As a matter of fact,
you know better about the situation of the churches than me.
After investigating many times, your dad and I firmly believe
that Almighty God is the returned Lord Jesus from God’s word.
Xiaomo, can you accept our fellowship?
Mm, but I still have some questions.
OK, tell me…
O Lord Jesus, You’ve really come back! (Amen!)
This is Your word. (Amen!)
I’m too corrupt.
Just like the Pharisees of that time,
I began to judge, resist, and condemn You before hearing Your gospel,
and said that Your work is a heresy and is a deception.
O Lord, I’m too arrogant and too foolish and ignorant. (Amen!)
O Lord! I’ve done so many things that resist You,
but You didn’t treat me according to my corruption. (Amen!)
You preached the gospel to me through the sister, (Amen!)
and let me hear Your voice. (Amen!)
O Lord! I’m unworthy of Your love (Amen!)
and unworthy of Your selection. (Amen!)
I deserve death! I’m the foremost of sinners who resist You.
O Lord! I’m willing to repent. (Amen!)
I’ll bring more brothers and sisters before You, (Amen!)
so that they can accept Your gospel (Amen!)
and receive the supply of Your word. (Amen!)
Brothers, let’s pray. (Mm. Okay.)
O Lord Jesus! Thank You for giving us such wonderful food.
May You cleanse the dishes on the table.
O Lord! The “Eastern Lightning” comes to steal sheep.
We should absolutely be faithful to the Lord
and protect the flock,
so as not to fail the Lord’s commission to us.
The Lord’s holy name is worthy of praise.
We pray in the holy name of the Lord Jesus Christ. Amen. (Amen.)
Have a seat. (Okay.)
Well, let’s start. Help yourselves.
Okay, have a drumstick.
Elder Wang, how’s the decor of your apartment going?
Finished. Now it only needs a little time to air out. (Oh.)
After moving in, I’ll treat you.
Come to my apartment for a party. (Okay. All right. We will…)
I heard that Elder Wang’s apartment is over 200 square meters.
Where did you buy it?
Yinghuang Manor.
Oh, Yinghuang Manor! The apartments there are top-grade. (Mm.)
Wow, you might buy it for several hundred thousand yuan, right?
Buy? Don’t you know that
Elder Wang has been working for the Lord for years. He isn’t a businessman.
How could he have money to buy it?
One of his relatives gave it to him.
Relative?
Yeah, a relative. This is the Lord’s grace. The Lord’s grace.
Okay. Let’s get to the point,
which is how to guard against the “Eastern Lightning” from stealing the sheep.
Mm.
Recently the “Eastern Lightning” is especially rampant.
Other sects also say that
many believers are taken away by the “Eastern Lightning.”
And even some important co-workers of the churches
and the senior believers who have believed in the Lord for years
and the brothers and sisters who pursue well have been deceived.
It seems that the situation is very serious.
Now it’s not only this problem.
The brothers and sisters become weak in faith and don’t attend meetings.
Additionally, the “Eastern Lightning” meddle in,
and thus the situation of the churches gets worse and worse.
Yes, we’re also in the same situation. (sigh)
The brothers and sisters are weak. There are fewer and fewer believers.
We must take good care of the churches,
otherwise the brothers and sisters will be deceived. (Mm.)
We must tell the brothers and sisters not to receive strangers privately.
If they claim to be believers in Jesus, we can even less receive them.
Even if they are our relatives,
we can’t bring them into the churches without permission.
It must be permitted by the elder.
Whoever refuses to listen should be expelled.
Tell the brothers and sisters that doing so is for their own good,
because they are so small in life and are unable to discern,
and they’ll be deceived.
Elder Wang, I have a problem.
Now except talking about how to resist the “Eastern Lightning,”
I have no more to say.
I feel dry in giving messages.
After completing a word, I don’t know what to follow.
The co-workers also asked me what to say in preaching.
I didn’t know how to answer them.
Then I told them directly, “Read the Bible.”
Er, if it continues like this, we’ll lose all the believers of the church.
What should we do?
We need to have faith. Pray more.
If it still doesn’t work, fast and pray.
(sigh) To recover the brothers and sisters’ faith,
we prayed in turn around the clock,
and fasted and prayed on 21st.
We thought we could revive the church through it.
Unexpectedly, the brothers and sisters told me
when it was the day to fast,
they felt increasingly hungry and couldn’t hold on. (sigh)
Hello? Oh, Sister Zhang. Well, anything wrong?
What? How do you know it?
Are you sure?
Mm.
Okay, I got it.
What’s going on? Anything wrong?
Li Mo believes in the “Eastern Lightning.”
Hmm? What?
Sister Zhang called just now.
She said that Li Mo told her many things about the “Eastern Lightning.”
Li Mo said that the Lord has returned,
and she acknowledged believing in the “Eastern Lightning.”
It’s really incredible.
She has such a firm foundation, but she is deceived by the “Eastern Lightning.”
Even Li Mo has been deceived.
It seems that this “Eastern Lightning” is not simple.
Yes. The brothers and sisters all trust Li Mo
and like to listen to her preaching.
If she begins to deceive people, most brothers and sisters will be taken away.
I know. We must take measures immediately.
You’re right. Right.
What should we say to the brothers and sisters?
Yes.
Tell them that … the “Eastern Lightning” lures people with money and beauty.
How about saying so?
Hmm … Li Mo was enticed by a young man from the “Eastern Lightning”;
she was photoed and thus is controlled.
Good! Just say so.
The government also says like this.
But the government’s words have no factual foundation.
As a believer in the Lord,
we can’t make groundless judgment and bear a false testimony.
If you don’t say so, our sheep will be all stolen.
Now the key point is to protect the flock.
At this … this crucial moment, don’t split hairs.
Mm. To protect the flock, we have no choice.
Right. Now fewer and fewer people attend meetings.
We can’t let the “Eastern Lightning” snatch away the sheep anymore.
Let’s do it first.
Never mind whether it is a fact. Just say it in the churches. (OK!)
(sigh)
Let’s eat more. Eat more. Eat, eat.
It is confirmed
that Li Mo has been completely deceived by the “Eastern Lightning.”
I could never have dreamt of it.
Is there really no hope?
(sigh)
I’ve never thought of that.
Now that this has happened, we must take measures at once.
Li Mo is very influential.
We can’t let her take away the brothers and sisters.
Elder, what should we do?
We must defend the true way and keep a good watch over the Lord’s flock. Right?
Yes. The “Eastern Lightning” lures people with money and beauty.
So Li Mo is enticed by a young man from the “Eastern Lightning.”
She was photoed and thus is under control.
Is it true?
Really? Li Mo isn’t that kind of person.
We’ve been in touch for many years. We all know her.
It’s probably not good to say so.
Yes. “Enticed by a young man.”
If the brothers and sisters hear it, they’ll say that we’re spreading rumors.
How could it be spreading rumors?
If you don’t say this, believers will be all taken away; will you be happy then?
Elder, let’s try to save Li Mo.
She’s irredeemable. She has to be expelled.
Expelled?
This is the newest material for guarding against the heresy,
the “Eastern Lightning.”
Take a look.
Now it’s dangerous to contact her.
After we go to the churches, we just tell the brothers and sisters
that Li Mo has been enticed by a man from the “Eastern Lightning.”
It’ll be of no effect if we don’t put it seriously.
The “Eastern Lightning”
often lures people into submission with beauty and money.
Those who refuse will be tortured cruelly.
For example, they will break their legs, gouge out their eyes,
and cut off their ears.
Jointly Printed by the State Bureau of Religious Affairs
and National Committee
of Three-Self Patriotic Movement of the Protestant Churches in China
Elder, the government said these things.
It even cracks down on our house churches and spread rumors about us.
Are these words believable?
Right. In fact it is without foundation.
Isn’t it foundation?
We don’t care whether the government’s words are rumors.
As long as they are beneficial to us, we can use them.
When it comes to the matter about the “Eastern Lightning,”
we should stand on the government’s side.
If we don’t say so, the brothers and sisters
will follow Li Mo to believe in the “Eastern Lightning.”
We do this for the sake of protecting the flock.
If we lose them, how can we explain that to the Lord?
We just say what the government says.
Then won’t everyone believe it?
Humph! Even if it is false, we can make it true.
How dare she take our people! Not so easy.
But the Bible says,
We can’t say causally what we didn’t see.
Otherwise, we’ll be judged by the Lord.
The Lord won’t remember it, and we do this to protect the flock.
Besides, if there is a judgment, let me be judged.
You just go to the churches and convey it to the brothers and sisters.
I think it’s not good to say so.
Li Mo is still unmarried now and she worked in the church all along.
In these years, don’t we know about her personality?
Even though she is deceived by the “Eastern Lightning,”
we can’t humiliate her like this!
You even don’t listen to the elder?
Li Mo has apostatized.
The church declares: Expel Li Mo!
From now on, no one is allowed to receive this betrayer.
Otherwise, they will have a part in her evil!
If she dares come back to deceive others, don’t be easy on her.
If you catch her, beat her hard!
Sister Wang.
You have apostatized. You’re not a member of our church anymore. Go!
What do you want?
Sister, I want to preach the Lord Jesus—
I don’t wanna listen. Go away!
Hey, sister. We’re both believers in God.
Let’s sit down and have a good talk.
Sister, the Lord Jesus has truly returned!
Please listen to God’s utterance!
You come to preach the “Eastern Lightning” again. What cheek!
Although Elder Wang and some co-workers
kept sealing off the churches,
most of the brothers and sisters in the former churches I was in charge of
accepted God’s end-time work.
It made me see that God’s end-time work can’t be hindered by any hostile force.
The gospel work here has almost been fully spread.
But the work in Zhangjiakou needs our cooperation.
I’m willing to go there to preach the gospel.
OK, let’s go there together! (OK!)
What’s wrong? What makes you so angry?
Come. Have some water and cool down.
I just got back from Sister Lu’s.
She said that recently several believers in Almighty God came here
and they went to the churches to snatch people.
I can’t let them snatch my sheep away.
Have you heard what they preached?
I don’t care what they preached!
All those who preach that the Lord has returned are heresies!
No. I have to tell those who are in charge of the churches again.
Hello, Sister Hu.
Recently those who preach the “Eastern Lightning” are active here.
Tell all the believers that they can never receive them.
Drive and curse them away if you see them.
If they don’t go, call 110. We can never be easy on them!
Whoever dares to receive the believers in Almighty God
will be expelled from the church!
Hello, is that Sister Wang?
Recently those who preach the “Eastern Lightning” are active here.
Tell all the believers that they can never receive them.
If you see them, just drive them away.
Is this serious? Should you be angry? (Yes!)
Hello, is that Sister Feng?
Hello, Sister Feng.
Recently those who preach the “Eastern Lightning” are active here.
Tell all the believers that they can never receive them.
Li Mo, how are things going with your preaching in that church these days?
I went to several villages.
There the preacher Wang Shuqin seals off the churches very tightly.
Besides, she makes many rumors to frighten the brothers and sisters
and condemns God’s work.
She says that we are a gang and that we are deceivers.
She tells the brothers and sisters not to receive any of us.
I barely got there and saw the brothers and sisters of their church.
After I entered the room, they drove me out before I could finish my words.
An old brother even tried to hit me with a stick.
Luckily I dodged in time.
Oh! This is the same situation as those villages I went to.
They regarded me as their enemy when seeing me.
They didn’t allow me to speak at all.
Yes, God’s work is so difficult!
The gospel work has barely begun to spread here
when these religious preachers fabricate rumors,
bind the brothers and sisters and seal off the churches.
Deceived by the preachers, they have an ill attitude toward us.
This is unavoidable.
Through these difficulties,
God perfects our will to suffer and our faith in God.
Since we have difficulties, we should pray to God and rely on God more.
I believe that God will lead us
to bring before Him the brothers and sisters who truly believe in God.
We can’t lose heart.
Mm, right! Try our best!
O Almighty God,
we’re willing to commit the brothers and sisters here who truly believe in You
into Your hand. (Amen!)
May You greatly move their heart. (Amen!)
Thus,
they can break free from the bondage of the religious leaders earlier, (Amen!)
know Your work, and accept Your salvation. (Amen!)
May God lead us and give us wisdom and power, (Amen!)
so that we can testify God’s gospel to the brothers and sisters
